definition: variant of 銹|锈, to corrode/to rust
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
tea stain (on the inside of a tea pot, tea cup etc)
(bird species of China) rusty-flanked treecreeper (Certhia nipalensis)
pinyin: xiu4 hong2 fu4 xuan2 mu4 que4

definition: (bird species of China) slaty-backed flycatcher (Ficedula hodgsonii)
(bird species of China) rusty-bellied shortwing (Brachypteryx hyperythra)
(bird species of China) rusty-cheeked scimitar babbler (Pomatorhinus erythrogenys)
(bird species of China) rusty-fronted barwing (Actinodura egertoni)

sentences.english: Use 2 to 3 minutes eash time, it can be used for around two weeks.
sentences.chinese: 用2至3分鐘的時間鏽，它可以用於兩個星期左右。

sentences.english: To determine the remnant contend of triadimefon of wheat, the GC was used.
sentences.chinese: 採用氣相色譜法測定小麥中粉鏽寧殘留量。

sentences.english: Among the Basic techniques are cross-stitch, crewel work, and quilting.
sentences.chinese: 最基本的技巧是十字針鏽和絎縫繡。

sentences.english: As iron is eaten away by rust , so the envious are consumed by their own passion.
sentences.chinese: 就像鐵被鏽腐蝕，嫉妒被本身的情感毀滅。

sentences.english: A probability method is presented for evaluating the maximum corrosion-induced expansive pressure in concrete.
sentences.chinese: 提出了混凝土中最大鏽脹力評估的概率方法。

sentences.english: Rust has eaten into the car's bumpers.
I put some oil on the squeaky hinge.
sentences.chinese: 我給鏽得吱吱響的鉸鏈上了點油。

sentences.english: So it was better to take the backcross method than other methods in anti-strip rust breeding.
sentences.chinese: 由此在抗條鏽育種上採用回交方法的效果較好。

sentences.english: Some ice melters contain corrosion inhibitors, but these products have not always proven effective.
sentences.chinese: 某些融雪劑含有阻鏽劑，但這些產品不總是有效的。

sentences.english: The paper describes a method, based on iodimetry , for determination sulphur in colloidal sulphur-triadimefon.
sentences.chinese: 提出基於碘量法測定粉鏽清中硫磺的方法。

sentences.english: Shimmery deep gold, with an opaque rusty brown base.
sentences.chinese: 不透明鏽褐色基調上閃耀着深金色。

sentences.english: Stem rust produces reddish brown reddish-brown spots on the stems of infected plants.
sentences.chinese: 稈鏽在感染的作物的莖上有微紅黃色的斑點。

sentences.english: A water-born paint for rusted iron and steel surface was developed.
sentences.chinese: 研製出一種水性帶鏽塗料。

sentences.english: Can use the small-scale wind-driven or electric rust removing the shelf above.
sentences.chinese: 可以使用小型風動或電動除去貨架上面的鏽。

sentences.english: When steel and iron comes in contact with oxygen and water, they become rusty.
sentences.chinese: 當鋼和鐵進到混合氧氣和水的溶器裏時，它們會發鏽。

sentences.english: In the room there was a huge stove overlaid with rust.
sentences.chinese: 房間中有一個長滿了鏽的大爐子。

definition: copper (chemistry)/see also 紅銅|红铜[hong2 tong2]/CL:塊|块[kuai4]
hammer/to hammer into shape/weight (e.g. of a steelyard or balance)/to strike with a hammer

to sinter/to agglomerate ore by burning
